Most esteemed Sir Prado

I owe a response to many official letters and letters from Your Lordship in Montevideo, as well as regarding the money that you have collected for this place, since with the payment of the notes about to take place, such remittances cannot be delayed.

Please overlook this reminder and consider the regards of your very affectionate and grateful friend Domingos José de Almeida Caçapava, March 19, 1839

March — 19 — 39 . Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima. General Chief of Police of the Department and Border of Alegrete. From Domingos José de Almeida.
